articles.title: Brittney Griner arrives in the US after being released from Russian custody in a prisoner exchange
articles.description: Brittney Griner, the American basketball star detained by Russian authorities in February, has safely returned to the United States after being released from custody in a prisoner exchange.
articles.content:

articles.title: The bizarre far-right coup attempt in Germany, explained by an expert
articles.description: Understanding the QAnon-influenced radical movement that just tried to make a minor noble the new king of Germany.
articles.content:
It sounds like something out of a novel: a cell of heavily armed German extremists plotting to overthrow the elected government and elevate a man called Prince Heinrich XIII to the throne of a new Teutonic monarchy.

articles.title: Inside Joe Biden’s Faustian pact with Russia to secure Brittney Griner’s release
articles.description: Deal led to exchange of notorious arms trafficker for US basketball star while not including former marine

articles.title: A Rush to See Hawaii’s Eruption Reveals Social Fissures on the Big Island
articles.description: The slow-moving lava flow from Mauna Loa’s rare eruption is drawing excited tourists, while drawing out long-simmering cultural tensions.
articles.content: POHAKULOA, Hawaii — When lava began spewing from the world’s largest active volcano late last month, for the first time since 1984, a surge of tourism followed. As the night sky above Mauna Loa lit up with orange hues, hotels across the Big Island of... [1013 chars]

articles.title: Police chief didn't know door where students were killed was open: report
articles.description: Moscow Police Chief James Frye said he “doesn’t know the answer whether the door” to the home where four University of Idaho students were slain was wide open the morning of their murders – as an unnamed neighbor has claimed.
articles.content:
The police chief of the college town where four University of Idaho students were slain last month has admitted that he was unaware that a neighbor reported seeing the door of their home wide open on the morning of the murders.

articles.title: The triple threat of the influenza, Covid and RSV
articles.description: CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen answers questions about the possible triple threat posed by RSV, influenza and Covid-19. How much should people be concerned? Who should be the most cautious?
articles.content:
CNN —
